meanings.definition: A building or complex of buildings containing a number of individually owned apartments or houses.
meanings.sent1: The condominium was a tall building with many different apartments.
meanings.sent2: I live in a condominium with my family.
meanings.sent3: The condominium was so big, it felt like a small town!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a condominium of thoughts, each room representing a different idea.
meanings.sent5: The condominium stood out in the city skyline, gleaming in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The individual apartment or house in a condominium complex.
meanings.sent1: His condominium had a beautiful view of the park.
meanings.sent2: She decorated her condominium with colorful furniture.
meanings.sent3: The tiny dog thought the condominium was a giant doghouse!
meanings.sent4: In her heart, the memories of childhood were stored in a cozy condominium.
meanings.sent5: The condominium's windows reflected the setting sun, creating a warm glow.
